name: Helicopter Fighter Combat
description:
You like fighting in the air with heli - helicopter plane fighter
Heli - helicopter shooting in the sky
You like heli - helicopter combat in the sky
You like shooting with heli - helicopter plane fighters in the sky
You like heli hell
This simple game of air heli - helicopter plane fighter combat action game with heli hell, motal sky combat game style
There are three heli - helicopter plane fighters you can choose
Virtual Joystick to control heli - helicopter plane fighter position
Fire, rocket buttons to turn fire on of heli - helicopter for shooting enemies
- Choose your heli - helicopter fighter from main menu and starting, like a hero against enemies ...
You like action game, battle, fighting, combat in the air with heli - helicopter plane fighter ... play this game. take funny guys.
